segments.text: The view through the open window is so wonderfully peaceful and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see a neat garden path and tidy bushes outside, bathed in daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a stark contrast to the unfolding chaos right here inside this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is gushing freely from the sink, creating a steady stream onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And that poor woman is just polishing a plate, completely unaware of the growing flood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the children are engaged in their own risky business on the other side of the room.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is practically defying gravity on that incredibly unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's plundering the cookie jar with such focused determination and stealth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me angry that the adult isn't paying any attention to either hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone could get seriously hurt with all that water and the wobbly stool tipping over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The entire kitchen is on the verge of becoming a watery, cookie-strewn mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout out a warning to them all about the dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of domestic negligence is truly astounding to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR
